alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Chilton; Shelby (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 2:12PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Chilton, southwestern Shelby and northeastern Bibb Counties through 245 PM CDT... At 212 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over West Blocton, or 13 miles north of Centreville, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Alabaster, Calera, Montevallo, Jemison, Woodstock, West Blocton, Wilton, Ashby, Brierfield Ironworks Park, American Village, University Of Montevallo, Maylene, Shelby County Airport, North Bibb, Minooka Park, Marvel, Camp Branch, Alabaster Veterans Park, Bounds Lake and Hebron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
